release.change: Complete rewrite of the module
UI completely based on templates
Bloggers can have any number of blogs
Blogs now tied to module instead of portal
Every blog has a set of permissions that govern ghost writing and commenting
Just one single module definition now
You can point the module to another to use the other's blog content
"Hybrid multilingual capable module"
Full localization: every blog post has optional translations
Regular localization: every blog post is labeled with a locale
Categories and tags can be translated
Select an image for each blog and post
Proper editor for categories
BlogML import and export
DNN 7 services layer to make a much more fluent UI
Changed the name of the module definition to avoid clash with Evoq Social
Increased robustness in v6 upgrade script to cater for some unusual situations that have surfaced
Addition of sitemap provider
Fixes to v 6 migration script
Fix to ViewSettings token replace
Support for templates to be included in skin folder so they can be distributed with skins
Fix/workaround to service scripts in light of breaking changes/bug in DNN 7.2
Fix to feed logic that caused some feed cache files to not be correct XML
Fix to revent two blog modules on the page accidentally showing the same content
Making sure that a notification is sent when a comment has been reported
Switched to Colorbox as lightbox plugin for default template as Fancybox was out of date and has switched to a non-commercial license
Fix to image handler so it will include mime-type in response
Include plain text author in feed RSS and not just the default RSS 2 fashion
Resolved issues with downloading old posts and post categories in WLW
Fixed width issues on a number of admin screen text boxes
Small fix to RSS author field
Fix to make publishing as blog owner work as it should
Added JS Safe protection to resx token replace logic
Correction to display logic to make sure new posts show up immediately
Modification of page title now configurable per module instance
You can now select multiple categories to show for a specific module instance
Fixed calendar displaying 01-01-0001 on blog calendar when logged in as admin
Removed 100% display width for HTML editor in edit screen
Fixed categories issue where category control disappears in ViewSettings after a postback
Fixed localization in local templates
Fixed several issues with RSS feed to make it more compatible with RSS readers
Fix to module copy code which prevented it from working before
Fix to edit post so that locale is not written to the database as an empty string but as null as it should be
Option to show management panel on child modules
Changed SPROC and code to ensure the right people are notified of pending comments.
Fix to have notification actions authentication assume the right module id so these will work from the messaging center
Fix to issue in categories in a post that will not save when no categories and no tags selected
Added global setting to handle timeout to increment View Count on a post
HTML Clean text before rendering to page metadata
Fixed script error in UpdatePost SPROC
Fix to code that prevented the output of user profile properties
Fixed module dropdown selector on the module settings control
